job_title: IT Student Worker in White Bear Lake, MN
pros: Most the time there is very little to do which leaves you with a lot of time to study. If your lucky there is a slight chance you can get the position right above you which is a CLA, the chances of this happening are very low as one has to retire or quit.
cons: Only 20 hours a week allowed. Rules are not thought to you well, leading you to get in trouble for things you could not have foreseen. Management makes ridiculous rules that all most no one follows. For example, "can not use personal laptop or device on the job". Which makes no sense considering this is an IT job. Unfortunately this brings me to my last point which is that you will learn almost nothing about IT on this job besides learning how to reset a starID.

job_title: Customer Service Specialist in White Bear Lake, Ramsey, MN
pros: Nice location, some of the long time employees were friendly. Insurance was cheap.
cons: Departments cut off from each other due to weird architecture, no employee lunch area, so not much of a chance to get to know others outside department, Union structure very limiting...Soon after I was hired I realized the dept was overstaffed and they didn't need me, but there wasa power struggle between my boss &  one of the deans. I was miserable, didn't have enough to do, but was told to LOOK BUSY. I  was looking for another job when they got rid of me. I was relieved, cuz my coworker was nuts anyway.

review_title: Good pay but many obstacles to productivity and workplace satisfaction

job_title: Anonymous Employee in White Bear Lake, MN
cons: The administration doesn't care about its employees. HR is currupt, ineffective, and a joke. The supervisor I had completely ruined the department she is supervising. Nearly all veteran employees left the organization due to the supervisor. Management, HR, and union reps were involved in the department due to the problems created by the supervisor, but Century College chooses to stick by its inept supervisors instead of listening to employees.
